column2: SELECT Top # G.ObjID  -- we want the photometric ObjID FROM Galaxy as G,   -- G is the galaxy   SpecObj   as S,   -- S is the spectra of galaxy G   SpecLine  as L,    -- L is a line of S   SpecLineNames as LN  -- the names of the lines  WHERE G.ObjID = S.bestObjID	-- connect the galaxy to the spectrum   and S.SpecObjID = L.SpecObjID   And S.z <= #
